DOC.criteria: Males female > 18 year old Mild moderate dry eye symptom Likely complete study visit able provide inform consent Current use topical cyclosporine Known contraindication study medication ingredient Active ocular disease uncontrolled systemic disease ( blepharitis patient actively treat disease uncontrollable ) Ocular surgery within past 3 month
